item.title: Meetup - Tuesday 27th March 2018 at The ODI Node in Leeds
item.description: Spring is in the air and itâ€™s time for a devops meetup at the ODI Node in Leeds on Tuesday 27th March. We bring you an couple of brilliant talks: 6:45 - 7:15 : Doors open, have a chat, make some new devops friends 7:15 - 7:25 : Group updates/news/announcements 7:25 - 8:05 : VeriSM - making sense of digital transformation - Claire Agutter 8:05 - 8:20 : Intermission 8:20 - 9:00 : Questions you should ask at your "
